snippet: Pope Francis declared Popes John XXIII and John Paul II saints on Sunday in an unprecedented ceremony made even more historic by the presence of emeritus Pope Benedict XVI in St. Peter's Square....

headline.print_headline: AP PHOTOS: John XXIII, John Paul II Names Saints
headline.main: AP PHOTOS: John XXIII, John Paul II Names Saints

lead_paragraph: Pope Francis declared Popes John XXIII and John Paul II saints on Sunday in an unprecedented ceremony made even more historic by the presence of emeritus Pope Benedict XVI in St. Peter's Square.
